      • getErrorMessage

        public abstract String getErrorMessage(LogMessageProvider.LogEventType eventType,
                     Integer statusCode,
                     PaydiantException exception)
        Returns the error message that will be displayed for an exception based on the eventType and statusCode.
        Parameters:
        eventType - - Log event type.
        statusCode - - status code of the PaydiantException
        exception - - PaydiantException object thrown.
        Returns:
        the error message that will be displayed for the exception based on LogEve

      • getErrorMessage

        public String getErrorMessage(PaydiantErrorDomain errorDomain,
                     Integer statusCode,
                     PaydiantException exception)
        Override this method to return error messages for an exception based on the errorDomain and statusCode. If this method is overridden, and returns a non-null value, then this will take precedence over the getErrorMessage(LogEventType, Integer, PaydiantException) method.
        Parameters:
        errorDomain - - error domain associated with the PaydiantException
        statusCode - - status code of the PaydiantException
        exception - - PaydiantException object thrown.
        Returns:
        the error message associated with the errorDomain and statusCode
        Since:
        6.2.0.1.a
        See Also:
        PaydiantException.getErrorDomain(), PaydiantErrorDomain
